statements: DELETE FROM WaterQualityData WHERE station_id = 1 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM WaterQualityData WHERE pollutant_level = 5.3 OR pollution_source = 'Industrial';

DELETE FROM water_quality_data
WHERE station_id = 1 AND pollutant_name = 'Lead';
DELETE FROM water_quality_data WHERE station_id = 1 AND date = '2022-05-15' AND pollutant_name = 'Lead';
DELETE FROM monitoring_stations WHERE station_name = 'River Station' AND location = 'XYZ River' AND monitoring_date = '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM water_quality_data WHERE station_id = 3 AND date = '2022-04-15'
DELETE FROM Pollution_Sources WHERE source_type = 'Industrial' AND location_lat < 40.0;
